text: @NYGovCuomo GovCuomo everywhere people go in nyc they are being turn down for COVID-19 testing we are told if not a patient of the business they won't test us to contact our primary care office.Then primary care office is saying they don't have COVID-19 testing. Everyone cant get a test why
